thread.title: #ModiInSiliconValley top trend on Twitter
thread.title_full: #ModiInSiliconValley top trend on Twitter - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: #ModiInSiliconValley top trend on Twitter
text:
SAN JOSE (California): Prime Minister Narendra Modi kept the twitterati talking about his first-ever visit to the Silicon Valley which made the hashtag #ModiInSiliconValley a top trend late Saturday. 

People took to the micro-blogging site to share their views and points on the prime minister's trip to San Jose where he met the top tech honchos, including Google's Sunder Pichai. 

Here is the list of following tweets: 

While #Pakistan Is Still Busy Trying To Enter Kashmir Valley, Indians Have Taken Down Silicon Valley by Storm. #ModiInSiliconValley 
— Sir Ravindra Jadeja (@SirJadeja) September 27, 2015 Qualcomm will do 1) 150 Million $ to be invested in India for Startup 2) Design in India #ModiInSiliconValley 
— Vivek Pandey (@Bharat_Putra) September 27, 2015 Watchin CEO of Cisko, Qualcom, Google, Microsoft along with our PM.Givin immense hope fr our country to take giant leap #ModiInSiliconValley 
— Shyam (@shmjtiwari925) September 27, 2015 Hearing about #DigitalIndia effort & vision for an India w/o "bureaucracy & paperwork" #ModiInSiliconValley pic.twitter.com/FOjixtThI8 
— marcidale (@marcidale) September 27, 2015
